content: Has anyone needed/used Drupal's "Link Checker" module for Backdrop? My client has asked for a page of links so he can make sure they're all correct (for a newly-migrated site). Is porting Link Checker the best option, or has anyone used something similar, or a different method for the same purpose?

The 7.x module ships with GovCMS 7 and gov agencies that are rebuilding their site in GovCMS 8 keep asking for the module. Since no stable 8.x version is available, we have been asking them to use a 3rd party software or service to check their links instead (there are many free ones out there).
Any suggestions? The free ones I found all have a limit of either links or pages, which I'm hitting...

I've been using the free version of https://peacockmedia.software/mac/integrity ...works for me.
